page.title: 09Local News in Penryn
page.content: The landlord of a local public house was stabbed in the early hours of {Monday 3rd June 1985.}He was taken from his premises in{West Street}to the city hospital in{Truro}with a knife in his abdomen.Official police report;in the early hours of{Monday} morning a middle aged man was addmitted to{Royal Cornwall}city hospital with a knife injury. On the{9th July 1985}on {Commercial Road}there was a small car crash out side a garage called {Carburation Services}.It was between a blue Ford Escort and a red sports car.
